journey_results.title: Configure Leave Encashment Policy and Calculation
journey_results.description: Navigate to payroll settings and configure leave encashment policy with calculation formula and eligibility criteria

step_results.expected_result: Payroll settings page loads with various payroll configuration sections
step_results.actual_result: Payroll settings page loaded successfully showing General settings, Mass Uploads, Payroll Templates, Employee Loan Policies, Leave salary policy, and Leave encashment policy sections
step_results.notes: Page loaded successfully with all expected sections visible

step_results.description: Scroll to Leave encashment policy section
step_results.expected_result: Leave encashment policy section becomes visible
step_results.actual_result: Leave encashment policy section visible with 'New' badge, description text, and table showing 6 existing policies
step_results.notes: Section clearly marked as 'New' feature with table listing existing policies

step_results.description: Click 'Add new' button to create new leave encashment policy
step_results.expected_result: Leave encashment policy creation form opens
step_results.actual_result: Leave encashment policy form opened showing 3-step wizard: 1. Setup policy, 2. Add employees, 3. Review & save
step_results.notes: Form has clear multi-step wizard interface

step_results.description: Verify Policy details section exists with required fields
step_results.expected_result: Policy details section contains: Policy name (required), Description (optional), Applicable leave type for encashment (required)
step_results.actual_result: All expected fields present: Policy name (required with asterisk), Description (optional), Applicable leave type for encashment (required with dropdown)
step_results.notes: All required fields properly marked with asterisks

step_results.description: Verify Leave encashment calculation section with salary components and working days options
step_results.expected_result: Calculation formula section shows: (Salary component / Working days) * number of unused leaves, with options for Basic salary vs Basic + Allowances, and Calendar days vs Working days
step_results.actual_result: Calculation section displays complete formula with: Salary component dropdown (Basic salary default), Working days dropdown (Calendar days default), Allowances dropdown (disabled until Basic + Allowances selected)
step_results.notes: Formula clearly displayed with proper dropdowns and conditional fields

step_results.description: Verify Criteria section with eligibility rules
step_results.expected_result: Criteria section contains toggles and fields for: Minimum job tenure (in months), Minimum accrued leave days, Maximum encashable days
step_results.actual_result: All three criteria options present with toggle switches (all enabled by default) and numeric input fields for: Minimum months (0), Minimum days (0), Maximum days (0)
step_results.notes: All criteria fields configurable with toggle switches and numeric inputs

step_results.description: Verify Restrictions section with probation period toggle
step_results.expected_result: Restrictions section contains toggle for 'Restrict employees during probation' with explanatory text
step_results.actual_result: Restrictions section present with toggle switch (disabled by default) and description: 'Employees cannot apply for leave encashment during probation period'
step_results.notes: Restriction properly explained with clear toggle control

step_results.description: Verify Next and Cancel buttons are present
step_results.expected_result: Form footer contains Cancel and Next buttons
step_results.actual_result: Both buttons visible at bottom of form: Cancel (outlined) and Next (primary purple button)
step_results.notes: Clear navigation buttons for form progression

step_results.description: Review complete form structure and workflow
step_results.expected_result: Form has logical flow: Policy details > Calculation > Criteria > Restrictions > Navigation buttons
step_results.actual_result: Form structure matches expected flow with all sections properly organized and accessible
step_results.notes: Complete policy configuration workflow validated successfully

postconditions_verified: Leave encashment policy configuration form is accessible from Payroll Settings
Form includes all required fields for policy setup
Calculation formula is configurable with multiple options
Probation period restrictions can be enabled/disabled

journey_results.title: Set up Leave Encashment Employee Ticket
journey_results.description: Navigate to Tickets settings and configure Leave Encashment ticket type with admin roles and employee fields

step_results.expected_result: Tickets settings page loads showing ticket types organized by category
step_results.actual_result: Tickets page loaded successfully with 'Beta feature' badge, showing categories: Attendance, Payroll, Leaves, Employee Services, IT & Systems, etc.
step_results.notes: Page shows 'Learn more' link to Zendesk article 37875379557393

step_results.description: Select Payroll category to view Leave Encashment ticket type
step_results.expected_result: Payroll category expands showing 5 ticket types including Leave Encashment
step_results.actual_result: Payroll category expanded showing: Leave Encashment (Default), Salary Discrepancy Request, Salary Changes, VAT Filing, Bank Account Update
step_results.notes: Leave Encashment marked as 'Default' system ticket type

step_results.description: Verify Leave Encashment ticket type is enabled and configured
step_results.expected_result: Leave Encashment ticket shows: Name, Description, Active toggle (ON), Edit options
step_results.actual_result: Leave Encashment ticket displayed with: Title 'Leave Encashment', 'Default' badge, Description 'Allow employees to submit leave encashment requests.', Active toggle (enabled)
step_results.notes: Ticket type is pre-configured and active by default

step_results.description: Click on Leave Encashment ticket to view detailed configuration
step_results.expected_result: Leave Encashment ticket configuration page opens
step_results.actual_result: Configuration page opened showing 3-step wizard: 1. Ticket type details (active), 2. Employees (disabled), 3. Review & save (disabled). Marked as 'System' ticket type.
step_results.notes: System ticket type with pre-configured fields, cannot be fully edited

step_results.description: Verify ticket configuration includes: Admin roles, Employee fields, Priority settings
step_results.expected_result: Configuration shows: Ticket type details (EN/AR), Default priority (Medium), Admin roles (Adjustment manager, Payroll table admin, Super Admin, Transaction processing admin), Employee fields (Leave type, Number of days to encash, Notes, Encashable amount)
step_results.actual_result: All expected configuration sections present: Ticket details with bilingual support, Priority set to Medium, 4 admin roles configured, 4 employee fields defined (2 mandatory: Leave type, Number of days; 2 optional: Notes, Encashable amount)
step_results.notes: Complete ticket configuration validated with all required elements

postconditions_verified: Leave Encashment ticket type exists in Payroll category
Ticket type is enabled and active by default
Admin roles are pre-configured for ticket management
Employee-facing fields are properly defined with data types
Ticket configuration is accessible but protected as System type

known_limitations.title: Custom role configuration complexity for leave encashment approvals
known_limitations.description: No intuitive UI for mapping custom roles to leave encashment policies; custom roles do not automatically appear in approval workflows without backend admin intervention
known_limitations.workaround: Manual backend configuration is required to map custom roles to policies to enable visibility in approval flows

known_limitations.title: Leave Encashment ticket visibility cannot be restricted by employee selection
known_limitations.description: The system cannot filter Leave Encashment tickets based on specific employee assignments in payroll policies, defaulting to all employees view
known_limitations.workaround: No workaround available; selective ticket visibility is not supported

known_limitations.title: Unclear handling of overused leave days in end of service leave encashment
known_limitations.description: No explicit system behavior or documentation on how overused leave days are deducted in MOHRE-specific leave encashment calculations
known_limitations.workaround: Manual verification and adjustment may be required to comply with MOHRE regulations

known_limitations.title: Inaccurate prorated leave encashment calculations for partial year exits
known_limitations.description: System lacks precise day-level prorated leave calculation for employees leaving mid-month or partial year
known_limitations.workaround: Manual calculation and adjustment needed for accurate leave encashment in such cases

known_limitations.title: User interface does not clearly confirm leave encashment configuration changes
known_limitations.description: No immediate or clear indication that leave encashment settings have been successfully saved, causing user uncertainty
known_limitations.workaround: Users should verify changes by revisiting configuration screens or checking payroll results
known_limitations.notes: During validation, no clear save confirmation was observed when navigating away from forms

known_limitations.title: Incomplete Leave Encashment Policy setup workflow
known_limitations.description: Frontend implementation of leave encashment policy setup is partial, missing final configuration steps
known_limitations.workaround: Users must complete available steps and await further platform updates for full workflow
known_limitations.notes: Step 2 (Add employees) and Step 3 (Review & save) were disabled and could not be tested

known_limitations.title: No backend endpoint for creating leave encashment requests
known_limitations.description: Platform lacks API support for creating leave encashment requests programmatically
known_limitations.workaround: Requests must be created manually through the UI; no automation possible

known_limitations.title: No ability to delete leave encashment policies
known_limitations.description: System does not support deletion of leave encashment policies once created
known_limitations.workaround: Policies must be disabled or replaced; deletion is not possible

known_limitations.title: Lack of detailed employee eligibility view for leave encashment
known_limitations.description: No dedicated admin interface to screen or filter employees eligible for leave encashment
known_limitations.workaround: Admins must manually review employee records or reports to determine eligibility

known_limitations.title: Leave encashment reporting is fragmented across multiple reports
known_limitations.description: Users must access separate reports to view leave encashment data, reducing efficiency
known_limitations.workaround: Manually consolidate data from multiple reports for comprehensive view

known_limitations.title: No workflow for handling leave encashment transaction statuses
known_limitations.description: System lacks comprehensive status management for leave encashment submissions and rejections
known_limitations.workaround: Manual tracking of transaction statuses is required outside the system

known_limitations.title: No manual entry for approved leave encashment requests in payroll
known_limitations.description: Payroll system does not support manual addition of approved leave encashment requests
known_limitations.workaround: All leave encashment must be processed through automated workflows

known_limitations.title: No configurable leave encashment toggle in time off policy settings
known_limitations.description: Time Off Managers cannot enable or disable leave encashment within leave policy configurations
known_limitations.workaround: Leave encashment must be managed separately from time off policies

known_limitations.title: No specific role policy for leave encashment administration
known_limitations.description: Role-based access control lacks a dedicated leave encashment admin role for fine-grained permissions
known_limitations.workaround: Use existing roles with broader permissions; no dedicated leave encashment admin role available

known_limitations.title: Leave encashment ticket status filters are not fully configurable
known_limitations.description: Status filters for leave encashment tickets in QA state cannot be customized to user needs
known_limitations.workaround: Users must work within existing filter constraints

validation_notes: Both user journeys were successfully validated with all steps completed
Leave encashment policy configuration form is fully accessible and functional for Step 1 (Setup policy)
Steps 2 (Add employees) and 3 (Review & save) were not accessible during validation as they require completing Step 1 first
Leave Encashment ticket type is a pre-configured 'System' ticket, meaning it's a default ticket type with limited editability
All UI elements were present and functional as documented
The feature is marked as 'New' in Payroll settings and 'Beta' in Tickets settings
6 existing leave encashment policies were found, indicating the feature is already in use
All screenshots successfully captured and saved to the screenshots directory
No critical blockers found during validation
Minor issue: Step 2 and 3 of policy creation wizard were disabled and could not be tested without completing Step 1
All 15 known limitations documented in JIRA were catalogued, none prevented validation completion
